title: CTRL0000050585 - Transcribed Interview of James P. Waldron, (February 18, 2022)

data.text: JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL,
The deposition in the above matter was held via Webex, commencing at 11:14
For the SELECT COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE
